metadata.title: CVE-2023-3441 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE/CE affecting all versionsstarting from 8.0 before 16.4. The product did not sufficiently warn aboutsecurity implications of granting merge rights to protected branches.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
